ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_BarrelBaseASF
ThingDef.description: A cylindrical barrel for general storage. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_TableMarketASF
ThingDef.description: A table to display different goods, like herbal medicine, cheese, milk, meat and bread.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_LargeShelfASF
ThingDef.description: A large square platform designed to store things, like herbal medicine, cheese, milk, meat, bread, wine, flour, wheat and vegetables.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_CrateASF
ThingDef.description: A wooden box made up of planks designed to store resources in an efficient manner. Items stored inside will not affect room beauty and will never deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_Crate2x2ASF
ThingDef.description: A wooden box made up of planks designed to store resources in an efficient manner. Items stored inside will not affect room beauty and will never deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_CupboardASF
ThingDef.description: An open cupboard to store and display objects in an efficient manner

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_EmptyShelfBaseASF
ThingDef.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.
A rack for storting smaller, one-handed melee weapons.\nItems stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.
ThingDef.label: Melee rack (A)

ThingDef.description: A rack for storting larger, one- and two-handed melee weapons.\nItems stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.
ThingDef.label: Melee rack (B)

ThingDef.description: A rack for storting large, mostly two-handed melee weapons.\nItems stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.
ThingDef.label: Melee rack (C)

ThingDef.description: A rack for storting larger bows.\nItems stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.
ThingDef.label: Ranged rack (A)

ThingDef.description: A rack for storting smaller baws.\nItems stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.
ThingDef.label: Ranged rack (B)

ThingDef.description: A rack for storting differnt kind of ranged weapons.\nItems stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.
ThingDef.label: Ranged rack (C)

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_EmptyCartBaseASF
ThingDef.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_SackBaseASF
ThingDef.description: A robust fabric bag. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_Bricks1x1BaseASF
ThingDef.description: Bricks that are stacked in an efficient manner to save more space.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_Log1x1BaseASF
ThingDef.description: Logs that are stacked in an efficient manner to save more space.

ThingDef.description: Timber that are stacked in an efficient manner to save more space.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_Ingot1x1BaseASF
ThingDef.description: Ingots stacked in an efficient manner to save more space.

ThingDef.description: A shelf primarily used for storing clothing.
